generated.css: body{font-family:Rubik,sans-serif;background-image:url(789f7117b1996a0c9a952726ae18af4f.jpg);background-size:cover;background-repeat:no-repeat;text-shadow:2px 2px 2px #fff,-2px -2px 2px #fff}header h1{font-family:Creepster,cursive;font-size:3rem}header a{display:inline-block;transition:.25s}header a:hover{transform:translate(-1px,1px)}nav{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;border-bottom:1px solid #000}nav a{text-decoration:none}nav a:visited{color:#000}#card{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}.card{border:1px solid #000;width:200px;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:3px 3px 10px grey;padding:10px;margin:10px}main{min-height:50vh}main .warning{color:red}main #delete-button{background-color:red;border:none;padding:7px 10px;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;font-size:1rem;margin:4px 2px;cursor:pointer;border-radius:5px;width:320px}#main-questions{margin-left:30px}form{display:flex;flex-direction:column}form button{background-color:rgba(173,66,244,.5);border:none;padding:7px 10px;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;font-size:1rem;margin:4px 2px;cursor:pointer;border-radius:5px;width:320px}form input[type=text]{border:1px solid #000;border-radius:4px;padding:8px;margin-bottom:15px;width:300px}form .button:hover{transform:translate(1px,1px)}footer{border-top:1px solid #000;margin-top:15px}footer ul{display:flex;justify-content:center}footer ul li{list-style:none;padding-right:20px}
